title: DON'T see like a radiologist! (fastai)
description: In this notebook we're going to explore the important issue of windowing from a rather different direction to what you've probably seen before... and will show you a new way to handle DICOM pixel rescaling that might just give your models a boost! We'll be using the fastai.medical.imaging library here - for more information about this see the notebook Some DICOM gotchas to be aware of.
